Description: Bone hair-pin; carved and polished; tapered with a pointed conical head separated from the shank by a series of fine horizontal incised lines and a moulding; complete.
Curator's comments: Identical to 1979,1017.213-215, 217 and surely made by the same craftsman.
Acquisition name: Transferred from: Victoria and Albert Museum
Donated by: Dr W L Hildburgh
